org.dockbox.selene.common.events

Class SimpleEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dockbox.selene.common.events.SimpleEventBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventBus

    public class SimpleEventBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventBus
    A simple default implementation of EventBus, used for internal event posting and handling.

      • checkListenerMethod

        protected static void checkListenerMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if a method is a valid listener method. A method is only valid if it:
        • Is annotated with Listener
        • Is not static
        • Is not abstract
        • Has at least one parameter which is a subcless of Event
        Parameters:
        method - the method
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
